name: Espresso
description: A single shot of espresso made with our signature blend of Arabica beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and a layer of frothed milk.

name: Latte
description: A smooth and creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Mocha
description: A rich and indulgent coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice for a refreshing pick-me-up.
